result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron Joseph Lawrence was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Aaron Joseph Lawrence is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Aaron Joseph Lawrence was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: in ieu of $443 costs; Consecutive to 90 day sentence; TIME SERVED

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Aaron Joseph Lawrence

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Aaron Joseph Lawrence in court in custody with attorney Vanessa R Paster.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft pleads No Contest freely and voluntarily to Count 2 and admits Repeater Allegation; Count 1 Dismissed; Court accepts plea and finds Deft Guilty; Court orders: 90 days RCJail, Concurrent with sentence now serving; $443 costs -- 9 days Jail in lieu of costs, Consecutive to sentence of 90 days.; Credit 99 days; TIME SERVED

Attorney Vanessa R Paster in court.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State to Prepare Writ.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 1, 2017 at 09:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for February 6, 2017 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for February 6, 2017 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Aaron Joseph Lawrence in court in custody with attorney Vanessa R Paster.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Motions to be filed by 12-2-2016.  State to prepare Writ.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 14, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Aaron Joseph Lawrence in court in custody with attorney Vanessa Paster.  Cheniqua White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calendar call scheduled for October 26, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on September 21, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Aaron Joseph Lawrence in court in custody with attorney Ryan W O'Hara.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set.
